entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename toggle button not shown up in light theme #72681
  • Incorrect "CS8602 Dereference of a possibly null reference" after pattern-matching through a derived type #72680
  • OverFlowOnFluentCall_ExtensionMethods is failing #72678
    17.10
  • Analyzer tearing issues with MSBuild and .NET SDK disagree on compilers #72672
  • Code using collection expression that compiled in .NET 8/.NET 9 preview.1 produces CS9215 in .NET 9 preview.2 #72668
  • IncrementalValuesProvider.GroupBy #72667
  • Calling MSBuildWorkspace.Create() throw exception System.MissingMethodException:“Method not found: 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray`1<System.Reflection.Assembly> #72666
  • Test plan for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" feature #72662
    .NET 9

Closed

  • `SyntaxFacts`'s `GetXXXKinds` methods can return nonexistent syntax kinds #72300
    Backlog
  • Suboptimal code for non-linear is-pattern expressions compared to switch #59615
    17.10
  • Pattern matching causing redundant jumps in generated IL (maybe a bug, maybe a good reason?) #55334
  • region text not updating when collapsed #69296
    17.8 P3
  • ```WellKnownMember.System_String__Format_IFormatProvider``` should actually be a `SpecialMember` #72280
    17.10
  • Add `SpecialType` entry for `ReadOnlySpan` #72102
  • The compiler doesn't flag errors in simple 'using' statements. #72496
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72688
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • generate package for clasp binary to ensure symbols exist #72686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Emit3 to `-testCompilerOnly` build flag #72685
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bind to the background of border #72682
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix exception for non-cs/vb document #72677
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update AI rename UI to make suggestion button more button-like #72676
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Opt into stj serialization on LSPclient #72675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create stronger type to expression compilation tracker internal policy #72673
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not generate obsolete `Exception` constructor #72671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove invisible character in official pipeline yaml #72665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Remove 'diagnostics cleared' event #72661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove legacy IDiagnosticService #72660
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Forward diagnostic reanalysis request to be a lsp pull diagnostic refresh instead #72659
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix indent #72683
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update EOL versions #72623
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Skip failing test #72679
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add status of feature "ref/unsafe in iterators/async" #72663
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary string[] allocations #72642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Emit extensions as plain struct types #72643
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Create API docs feedback template #72670
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Introduce a concept of internal special types, move all members defined in special types to the SpecialMember set. #72646
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove feature flag option #72689
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fixes for Linux release build #72658
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Using Segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #72656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Hande error scenarios involving target types and named arguments in nullable walker #72635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
